name: car-next-strapi-monorepo
description: JuniorCars - Next.js frontend with Strapi backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/.next backend/.tmp backend/build
scripts.seed: cd backend && npm run strapi script scripts/seed-data.js
